Rewards Rate: 3% Cashpoints on groceries, dining, and supermarket spends. 2% Cashpoints on utility spends. 1% Cashpoints on other spends, with some exclusions
Reward Redemption: The Cashpoints can be redeemed against card statement balance, hotel and flight ticket bookings, on the Smartbuy rewards portal, where 1 Cashpoints = Rs. 0.25

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal Fee is Waived on Annual Spends of ₹25,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawal amount or Rs. 500, whichever is higher

product_details: 3% Cashpoints on supermarket, dining, grocery, and PayZapp spends
1% Cashpoints on other spends excluding some spend categories
Up to 50 days of interest-free credit period
Renewal fee waiver on spending Rs. 25000 or more in the previous year
